scripts.build: npm run clean:dist && concurrently -r "npm run less" "npm run build:ts" && npm run cordova
scripts.build:ts: npm run ts && npm run bundle
scripts.bundle: mkdirp app/dist && browserify app/src/main.js -d -t stringify -o app/dist/app.js -v -p [minifyify --no-map]
scripts.copy: mkdirp cordova/www && concurrently -r "npm run copy:dist" "npm run copy:fonts" "npm run copy:images" "npm run copy:index"
scripts.cordova: npm run copy && plat cordova prepare && plat cordova build
scripts.start: tsc server/*.ts -m commonjs -t es5 && concurrently -r -k "npm run watch" "node server/app"
scripts.watch: npm run ts && concurrently -r -k "npm run watch:bundle" "npm run watch:ts" "npm run watch:less"
scripts.watch:bundle: mkdirp app/dist && watchify app/src/main.js -d -t stringify -o app/dist/app.js -v
scripts.watch:less: nodemon -q -w app -e less --exec npm run less
